title: Lower inflation, higher unemployment on SRPC

content.prompt: Which of the following relationships is illustrated by a short-run Phillips curve?

choices.label: A decrease in the rate of inflation is accompanied by an increase in the rate of economic growth.
A decrease in the rate of inflation is accompanied by an increase in the rate of unemployment.
An increase in the rate of inflation is accompanied by a decrease in the rate of economic growth.
An increase in the rate of inflation is accompanied by an increase in the rate of unemployment.
A decrease in the rate of economic growth is accompanied by a decrease in the rate of unemployment.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
